meanings.definition: Relating to or derived from phenol.
meanings.sent1: The phenolic cleaner left a strong smell in the room.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended a phenolic solution for cleaning the wound.
meanings.sent3: The phenolic scent in the air made everyone think of a hospital.
meanings.sent4: Her phenolic personality was as sharp and distinct as the smell of antiseptic.
meanings.sent5: The phenolic odor lingered in the room long after the cleaning was done.

meanings.definition: A compound containing a phenol group.
meanings.sent1: The phenolic was used in the production of plastics.
meanings.sent2: She studied the properties of different phenolics in chemistry class.
meanings.sent3: The phenolic on the lab table seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: The phenolic in the mixture acted as a catalyst, speeding up the reaction.
meanings.sent5: The phenolic compound was the key ingredient in the new medication.
